AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: A baludrian asks the other one what it’s like to have refugees at home. The host answers that it’s difficult, but what if it was his wife and children who were in a situation like that. He cannot bear the thought of it.

Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: To live with refugees one-liners

Citizen_01.synopsis: Vignette: To live with refugees one-liners

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.speaker: Larca Mena
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.text: How are your new guests settling in?

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.speaker: Druggag
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.text: Well enough, well enough. Though the city's been a shock to them, after all that time on the road.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.speaker: Larca Mena
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.text: Must have been a hard walk from Elturel. They'll get used to it.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.speaker: Larca Mena
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.text: Six children, four adults... it must be a bit of a squeeze.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.speaker: Druggag
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.text: We manage. They didn't bring much with them, of course - not so much as a rattle for the babe.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.context: NodeContext: thinks this is a real shame

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.speaker: Larca Mena
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.text: I can spare some things. My boy's all grown up now - he won't miss a toy or two.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.speaker: Druggag
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.text: Never thought I'd end up taking in refugees.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.speaker: Larca Mena
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.text: It's a good thing you're doing. More than most would do.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.speaker: Druggag
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.text: I just pictured my own young'uns out on that road, no home, no shelter... It don't bear thinking about.

Citizen_02_0.speaker: Druggag
Citizen_02_0.text: I'm just trying to do my bit, same as everyone else.

Citizen_02_1.speaker: Druggag
Citizen_02_1.text: If everyone made room for a few more, there'd be no refugee 'crisis.' City'd be better for it, too.

Citizen_01_0.speaker: Larca Mena
Citizen_01_0.text: Wherever you've come from, know you're welcome in Baldur's Gate.
Citizen_01_0.context: NodeContext: Reassuring, assumes you're a refugee

Citizen_01_1.speaker: Larca Mena
Citizen_01_1.text: New to the city, are you? Don't worry - it's not as scary as it seems.
Citizen_01_1.context: NodeContext: Reassuring, assumes you're a refugee
